name: Scripteon

screenshots.caption: Scripteon Editor - Used for the edition of scripts

short_description: Scripteon is an evolutionary tool enabling the creation of portable scripts that are easy to build without any software development skills. For instance, such scripts can be aimed at deploying websites, compiling software or automating strategic tasks...
